reuters.title: FIRST WISCONSIN ADDS LOAN LOSSES, SEE 2ND QTR LOSS OF 2.80 DLRS A[B SHARE
reuters.body: Acton Corp said shareholders at the annaul meeting approved a one-for-five reverse split that takes effect June 25. It said holders also approved a limitation of directors' liability and indemnity agreements between the company and its officers and directors. Reuter 
